content: this text is about a legal case involving the distribution of assets and goods worth 14000 euros the case started on january 13 2021 and ended on october 29 2023 the court ruled that the deceased persons widow and daughter are the heirs and will receive half of the estate each the court also mentioned that an inheritance agreement was reached among the heirs specifying who will inherit the funds in the bank accounts and the car the court issued a final order of succession and transferred ownership of the car to the heirs the parties have the option to waive their right to appeal the order if they choose to appeal they have 15 days to do so and the appeal must be accompanied by a sufficient number of copies for all parties involved the appeal will be decided by the ljubljana high court the court fee for the appeal must be paid within the specified time limit if not paid on time the appeal will be deemed withdrawn the text concludes with the date of october 29 2021 in ljubljana

metadata.subject_of_succession: funds on the personal bank account, funds on the savings account, car
